body.h1: {{th361|LISTENING with FILLING IN FROM A MENU}}
body.p: {{tp361|Your task is to fill in the empty boxes based on the initial listening. We recommend to proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli362|Then, play the recording and try to capture the information concerning the incomplete texts. When listening, you can simultaneously fill in the correct answers.}}
{{tli363|Click on the empty gap - a menu with items appears.}}
{{tli364|Click a selected item. It will be filled in to the gap.}}
{{tli365|If you do not capture all the information, you can listen to the recording repeatedly.}}
{{tli366|Playing sound can be interrupted anytime by clicking Pause button and then continued by clicking Play button.}}
{{tli367|Recording can be played from any place you choose. By clicking recording indicator specify the point from which you wish to start playing. Then click Play button.}}
